name: A Tale Of Life
description:
Made For DevSquad Summer Game Jam

Levantar Studio

Developers:

Imtiaz Hossain Sabree (Art & Level Design)

Charles Chayon Mandal (Gameplay Programming)

Mesbah Ur Rahman (Art, UI & Gameplay Programming)

Story

A Tale Of Life

Once there was a village near a jungle,a mysterious jungle..People of that village used to earn their livelyhood from that jungle..
But many people got disappeared from there over time and they never came back.No one had the guts to search for them..

That's not all...
There also happenned a disaster 20 years ago.During that time,a huge number of people got disappeared from that village.
People who remained there could never remember what had happened to them...

One day a man from another kingdom went there for hunting.But suddenly he lost his way out...
So he started exploring the jungle..and gradually the mystery of that jungle started revealing to him.
He discovered the unsolved myths and mysteries of that jungle...

Instructions

Move Forward - W
Move Backward - S
Move Right - D
Move Left - A
Fire - Left Mouse Button
R - Reload
SpaceBar - Jump
Shift - Sprint
Pause - Escape
Equip - Mouse Wheel UP/Down
Interact - F

Golden Chest Carries Key To Lock The Door

The Rest Of The Instructions Will Be In The Game
Keep An Eye Out For The RED Texts On Screen
Happy Gaming!!!

Report Bug If You Find Any.

Thank You.

All the assets were made by  us during the jam. Only the animations were taken from mixamo & the sounds & fire particle was taken from Unreal Engine Starter Content.
